This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters from the config above, clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

There is no site, but Microsoft Store and Whatsapp

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, EasyList Italy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I've added the adguard server proxy to the Windows one for filter all things on my PC. I'll give you two screenshot. One of Microsoft Store where is loading nothing and the second one is Whatsapp where i can message but i cannot download the images. I tried to watch the logs on AdGuard, but there is nothing showing when i try to open Microsoft Store or Whatsapp downloading images.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
Screen Microsoft Store: 

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9847632/7be940cf-e01e-4f6b-a759-d24d40fb9a6d)
</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>
Screen Whatsapp: 

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9847632/628a7e0f-d361-436c-9bb5-8e488d2028a6)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Hi! Could you check it with disabled filters, leaving the protection on?

Hey! Thanks for reply!
I tried again, for making all sure of that problem.

- Microsoft Store, still not loading with filter disabled.
- Whatsapp (App of Windows): still not loading audio or images.

With Web Whatsapp on browser there is no problem.

If i remove the protection all is not working cause of the proxy. 

Tried to remove the DNS filter too but nothing change.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

There is no site, but Microsoft Store and Whatsapp

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, EasyList Italy

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. I've added the adguard server proxy to the Windows one for filter all things on my PC. I'll give you two screenshot. One of Microsoft Store where is loading nothing and the second one is Whatsapp where i can message but i cannot download the images. I tried to watch the logs on AdGuard, but there is nothing showing when i try to open Microsoft Store or Whatsapp downloading images.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>
Screen Whatsapp: 

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/9847632/628a7e0f-d361-436c-9bb5-8e488d2028a6)

</details>

issue.title: url param tracking: add $removeparam=_branch_referrer

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

in urls such as `https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/ngzh/episodes/Verschrnkung--Plastik--Parasiten-e23ae4m?%24web_only=true&_branch_match_id=...&_branch_referrer=...` the param `_branch_referrer` will not be removed, yet.
but it should be removed.

### Proposed solution

add

`$removeparam=_branch_referrer`

to TrackParamFilter/sections/general_url.txt

and remove
```
click_id=*_branch_referrer=$removeparam
```
in the same file (because it will be redundant) as well as the lines
```
||tumblr.com^$removeparam=_branch_referrer
||open.spotify.com^$removeparam=_branch_referrer
||reddit.com^$removeparam=_branch_referrer
```
in TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt.

furthermore line
```
||blog.twitch.tv^$removeparam=/web_only|_branch_referrer/
```
could be reduced to
```
||blog.twitch.tv^$removeparam=web_only
```


### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: mail.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.com) ### Comment > Problem :- ag base filter prevents the Brave shields to block of the blank frame on the right side of the inbox. But when i disable ad base filter then Brave Shields working without any issue. But i do not want to disable ag base filter for this one issue. > > Step to reproduce the issue :- Go to brave shields > set it to Aggressive > then go to custom filter > import ag base filter from this link https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt then open the inbox of mail.com. you will see the blank frame. But if you disable the ag base filter then shields will block the blank frame successfully. > > Possible solution :- add this filter ' mail.*##html.can-have-sky .page-body > .section-content:style(margin-right: 0 !important;) ' to ag base filter list. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nj2jqtc4q4gws00c4gkwggk8ow8sg4jpwvahnhpc00.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Brave Shields Browser: | Brave Browser Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

issue.title: mail.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.com) ### Comment > Problem :- ag base filter prevents the Brave shields to block of the blank frame on the right side of the inbox. But when i disable ad base filter then Brave Shields working without any issue. But i do not want to disable ag base filter for this one issue. > > Step to reproduce the issue :- Go to brave shields > set it to Aggressive > then go to custom filter > import ag base filter from this link https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt then open the inbox of mail.com. you will see the blank frame. But if you disable the ag base filter then shields will block the blank frame successfully. > > Possible solution :- add this filter ' mail.*##html.can-have-sky .page-body > .section-content:style(margin-right: 0 !important;) ' to ag base filter list. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nj2jqtc4q4gws00c4gkwggk8ow8sg4jpwvahnhpc00.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Brave Shields Browser: | Brave Browser Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist

EasyList Cookie List

NoCoin Filter List

comment.body:
This rule must fix that space, as in AdGuard. But `margin-right` is not changed in Brave. maybe a bug.
`3c-lxa.mail.com#$#.section-1.section-content.section { margin-right: 0 !important; }`


### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.com) ### Comment > Problem :- ag base filter prevents the Brave shields to block of the blank frame on the right side of the inbox. But when i disable ad base filter then Brave Shields working without any issue. But i do not want to disable ag base filter for this one issue. > > Step to reproduce the issue :- Go to brave shields > set it to Aggressive > then go to custom filter > import ag base filter from this link https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt then open the inbox of mail.com. you will see the blank frame. But if you disable the ag base filter then shields will block the blank frame successfully. > > Possible solution :- add this filter ' mail.*##html.can-have-sky .page-body > .section-content:style(margin-right: 0 !important;) ' to ag base filter list. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nj2jqtc4q4gws00c4gkwggk8ow8sg4jpwvahnhpc00.png?nc=1)

issue.title: mail.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.com) ### Comment > Problem :- ag base filter prevents the Brave shields to block of the blank frame on the right side of the inbox. But when i disable ad base filter then Brave Shields working without any issue. But i do not want to disable ag base filter for this one issue. > > Step to reproduce the issue :- Go to brave shields > set it to Aggressive > then go to custom filter > import ag base filter from this link https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt then open the inbox of mail.com. you will see the blank frame. But if you disable the ag base filter then shields will block the blank frame successfully. > > Possible solution :- add this filter ' mail.*##html.can-have-sky .page-body > .section-content:style(margin-right: 0 !important;) ' to ag base filter list. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nj2jqtc4q4gws00c4gkwggk8ow8sg4jpwvahnhpc00.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Brave Shields Browser: | Brave Browser Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances,
EasyList Cookie List

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List

comment.body:
Easylist does not block mailderef.mail.com We block. And the rule above must remove that blank space.
Also I can't reproduce this problem with Ublock with Easylist + AdGuard filter = `3c-lxa.mail.com#$#.section-1.section-content.section { margin-right: 0 !important; }` fixes that problem.
I think it is a bug - Brave can't apply that rule.

Because our filter is not included in Brave, and the problem is not reproduced with ad blocker extensions, there is no need to delete the rule.

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://home.bt.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhome.bt.com%2F) ### Comment > An h1 header > ============ > > Paragraphs are separated by a blank line. > > 2nd paragraph. *Italic*, **bold**, and `monospace`. Itemized lists > look like: > > * this one > * that one > * the other one > > Note that --- not considering the asterisk --- the actual text > content starts at 4-columns in. > > > Block quotes are > > written like so. > > > > They can span multiple paragraphs, > > if you like. > > Use 3 dashes for an em-dash. comment.body:
I should note that I can't read the other language that's being used in this issue.

That said, of course that's the way it works... I didn't see this again for several hours after making my comment, where before I had been seeing it almost every other video?

And while thinking on it, I was actually in the middle of a large set of package updates. It's possible that my browser, or one of its dependency libraries, wasn't functioning correctly at the time.

I'll come back if I see it again, otherwise I think consider my comment invalid.

> I am observing two different YouTube behaviors.
> 
>   1. If I'm logged in to my account.
>     1.1 AdGuard is enabled: YouTube shows blocking overlay.
>     1.2. AdGuard is disabled: YouTube works, but with ads. I.e., I'm not banned.
> 
>   2. If I'm not logged in and cleaned all cookies (e.g., "incognito"). AdGuard is on.
>     The video starts. After a while it stops. The first ad video starts loading (a "spinner" appears). It cannot load. It shows a static image (from ytimg.com) of the ad and a "skip" button for a few seconds. The same thing is repeated for the second ad videp. The main video resumes from the breakpoint.

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://mail.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.com) ### Comment > Problem :- ag base filter prevents the Brave shields to block of the blank frame on the right side of the inbox. But when i disable ad base filter then Brave Shields working without any issue. But i do not want to disable ag base filter for this one issue. > > Step to reproduce the issue :- Go to brave shields > set it to Aggressive > then go to custom filter > import ag base filter from this link https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt then open the inbox of mail.com. you will see the blank frame. But if you disable the ag base filter then shields will block the blank frame successfully. > > Possible solution :- add this filter ' mail.*##html.can-have-sky .page-body > .section-content:style(margin-right: 0 !important;) ' to ag base filter list. ### Screenshots
